group_1.textLeft: Hm... So running didn't make you feel any better?

group_1.textRight: Nope...
Yuna, I'm sure you can figure out,
The problem that Sakuya is having.

group_1.textLeft: Well... If simply running as fast as you can is not@enough,
There must be something else that you want.
For example...
Could it be that you need a competitor?
Maybe you wanted to compete with someone to@get that sense of victory,
But since you couldn't do that, you were left@unsatisfied... Does that sound right?

group_1.textRight: Of course there's always that competitive spirit@when it comes to racing,
But I don't...think I care that much about beating@a rival.

group_1.textLeft: Then fame, perhaps?
If you run fast enough,
And get top results, you could get noticed and@become famous.

group_1.textRight: Hmm... I'm not interested in that, truthfully.
Cheering crowds have always made me@uncomfortable.
I like to run by myself and keep track of my time.

group_1.textLeft: So, is getting a good time important to you?

group_1.textRight: It is.
I'm happy if I can shave even a second off of@my personal best...

group_1.textLeft: That's it!

group_1.textRight: Huh?

group_1.textLeft: Sakuya, the reason you like to give it your all@when running...
...Is so that you can beat your previous time and@get a sense of accomplishment.

group_1.textRight: You know...Maybe that's it...

group_1.textLeft: Yes, I'm sure it is.

group_1.textRight: In the past, I went through a lot of trial and error@with my form.
I was really excited when I could beat my old@record by even 0.01 of a second!

group_1.textLeft: But now that you have strength from magic...
Which thereby shortens your time, you feel as@though your best isn't truly your best?

group_1.textRight: That's a possibility...

group_1.textLeft: But that doesn't mean you can't find something@else to devote yourself to, does it?

group_1.textRight: No, absolutely not. I can't give up on track.

group_1.textLeft: You sure answered fast...
Does track mean that much to you, Sakuya?

group_1.textRight: It's as important to me as Yuna is to you.

group_1.textLeft: That goes beyond just "important"...!

group_1.textRight: That's why I can't give up on it so easily.
Even before I became a Magical Girl, track was@everything to me.
And when I made my contract...
It's what I devoted my wish to.
